main.name: Elleanna Dwyer
main.description: Philadelphia based React Developer, currently employed at Printfly Co. where I specialize in Front-End programming across a range of internal applications
main.bio: With a bit of an unconventional background in programming, I believe my experience exemplifies my ability to learn quickly and highlights a certain technological savvy. Beginning with my apprenticeship, I have over 6 years of experience in the development field, with the last two years focusing on React.js. I thoroughly enjoy being around people and working on a team. I believe some of the most important lessons I have learned throughout my experience has derived from collaborative efforts. Outside of work you can catch me crackin mad jokes.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Studied the theory of effective communication and how it applies to media, technology, and general interpersonal interactions. Coursework included material heavily prevelant in fields such as Public Relations, Advertising, Computer Science, and Journalism.

work.title: Development Apprentice / Quality Assurance
work.description: Facilitated the development and implication of quality standards across a range of application projects for iOs, Android, and Web via user testing. Shadowed mid and senior-level developers to foster my programming skills and assist in any way needed.

work.title: Developer
work.description: Participated in the design and development of various web applications ranging from internal projects to big client operations with a heavy focus on clean code and user-friendly design. Provided mentorship for students in our apprenticeship program. Engaged and helped organize multiple outside-of-work events that focused on the education of programming specifically as it applies to women in tech.

work.title: React Developer
work.description: Began my journey as a React Developer by working with an amazing team to design and develop websites from the ground up for a variety of internal facing applications. Specifically, web apps being used by our Sales Team and our Production Team to help improve business practices and the efficiency of every day operations.

projects.title: Weird Reddit
projects.category: A feed of some of my favorite weird subreddits, built with React and using Hooks for state management.
